程序包 uestc.zhanghanwen.ATTCK.GraphCRUDServices.DeleteServices

接口 DeleteService

所有已知实现类:
DeleteGroupServiceImpl, DeleteMatrixServiceImpl, DeleteMitigationServiceImpl, DeleteServiceImplement, DeleteSoftwareServiceImpl, DeleteTacticServiceImpl, DeleteTechniqueServiceImpl
public interface DeleteService
The interface for all Services inside. This is the interface oriented mode, that makes easier for DeleteServiceBundle to manage all services.
版本:
1.0
作者:
zhanghanwen
另请参阅:
  • DeleteServiceBundle

    deleteOne(String mitreId)
    delete one node.

    deleteRelationship(String startNodeMitreId, String endNodeMitreId)
    delete a relationship by specifying start node and end node mitre id.

  • 方法详细资料

    • deleteOne

      ResultWrapper deleteOne(String mitreId) throws Exception
      delete one node.
      参数:
      mitreId - mitre id
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of all queried results.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.deleteByMitreId(java.lang.String) fails

    • deleteRelationship

      ResultWrapper deleteRelationship(String startNodeMitreId, String endNodeMitreId) throws Exception
      delete a relationship by specifying start node and end node mitre id.
      参数:
      startNodeMitreId - mitre id
      endNodeMitreId - mitre id
      返回:
      ResultWrapper of all queried results.
      抛出:
      Exception - if NodeRepository.deleteRelationships(java.lang.String) fails
